text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I-I-I... I hope, I hope I'm not bothering<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
No need to be so formal. I should<n>apologize for calling you
here when<n>you're still settling in.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
O-oh, not at all! Um, the p-p-p-privilege<n>is all mine. ...No, wait,
the pleasure?<n>U-um!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha... Well, I should start with an<n>introduction. I am Symboli
Rudolf,<n>Tracen Academy's student council<n>president.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Special Week, we warmly welcome<n>you. If you ever have
any issues with<n>your student life, please feel free to<n>let us
know.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Th-thank you! Pleased to meet you!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Likewise. As you already know,<n>Tracen Academy is the
country's<n>greatest learning facility for<n>Umamusume
longing to enter the<n>racing world.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Here you'll inspire and be inspired<n>through friendship and
rivalry, find<n>your one and only trainer, and battle<n>on with
frenzied effort in the Twinkle<n>Series.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I expect you to work vigorously in<n>achieving a bright future
for yourself.<n>Welcome to Tracen Academy, Special<n>Week.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That said, I was hoping to offer you a<n>tour after our meeting,
but...<n>unfortunately, I have other affairs<n>with the student
council that I must<n>attend to.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Which! Means! That! It's my time to<n>shine!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eep!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
When Prez is in trouble, I'm the one<n>who comes running!
Me, the<n>venerable Tokai Teio! Wahahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wh-wh-wh-wh-where did you just<n>come from?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Teio... it's fine if you want to kid<n>around, but you could
choose a better<n>time and place.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Okaaay, sorry about that. ♪ Ah,<n>you're the new transfer
student,<n>right? I'm Tokai Teio, nice to<n>meetcha! ♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: All right, let's get on with the tour! On<n>your marks, gooo!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: H-huh?! W-wait for meeee!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Goodness...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Whatever the case, I know I can trust<n>Teio.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Right then! Let the academy tour<n>begin! First up, this is our
classroom!<n>We gotta study too, you know!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Hm... Showing you this is pretty<n>boring, yeah? Any old
school has<n>classrooms. Come on! To the next<n>place!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh, already?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ta-daaaa! It's the turf track! From<n>here on, you'll be
training on this<n>beauty!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wooow, amazing! It's so well-kept<n>and clean!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Well, that's all thanks to the<n>maintenance staff! Thank you,
staff,<n>for always supporting us!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Okay, onto the next place!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: There's more?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Now it's time for a back-to-back<n>marathon through three
training<n>facilities!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
First up is the school's gym. All the<n>devices were built to be
used by us<n>Umamusume, so going full throttle is<n>totally
okay! ♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
This is the pool! Being able to swim<n>no matter the time of
year is the best!<n>Incidentally, I'm especially great at<n>
diving!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But my number one thing is dancing!<n>Forgetting to practice
for the winning<n>concerts is a big no-no, you hear?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, and here, this is... Huh? New girl?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-yes, I'm here! Sorry to keep you<n>waiting.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hmmm. Are you tired? Well, theacademy is really spacious, andwe have been running fromplace to place.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Weeeell... Yeah... All right, I've<n>decided! Now's the perfect
time, too!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Let's move on to the last place in our<n>tour!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Hey, this isn't Tracen Academy! Why<n>are we at the Tokyo
Racecourse?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Come, come, no need to fret the<n>deets! Rather, we need to
hurry up<n>before things start!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I'm talking about the G1 race, of<n>course!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
That's right! It's part of the<n>prestigious Twinkle Series that
every<n>racer aspires to!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Within the series, the G1 races are<n>the toppest of top-class!
And this<n>one's about to begin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Rounding the fourth corner is number<n>three, Antagonist! But
number seven,<n>Ribbon March, holds on! Look at her<n>
persevere!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And here comes number ten, Ay<n>Tanri, from the outside!
She's pulling<n>to the front with incredible speed!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
200 meters to go! They're neck and<n>neck for the lead! It's
a close one!<n>They're running side by side, right up<n>to the
finish line!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wooooow!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Such thunderous cheering, it's like astorm! The crowd feels soelectric! )

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: So this is the Twinkle Series!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
How about that, new giiirl? Tell me<n>what you think of a real
G1. ...Oh.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, doesn't look like I need to<n>ask!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I feel so energized! No, maybe<n>it's more like...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I want to be on that stage too! I want<n>to appear in the
Twinkle Series and<n>seize my dreams!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Mom, Mama, now that I'm here at<n>Tracen Academy in
Tokyo, I'm gonna<n>give it everything I've got!
